statements: SELECT * FROM patient_health_outcomes WHERE age > 50
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM patient_health_outcomes WHERE treatment = 'Medication A'
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, treatment FROM patient_health_outcomes WHERE outcome = 'Improved'
SELECT diagnosis, patient_name, age FROM patient_health_outcomes WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 40
SELECT * FROM patient_health_outcomes WHERE patient_name LIKE '%John%'
SELECT * FROM patient_health_outcomes WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM patient_health_outcomes WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, treatment FROM patient_health_outcomes WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%infection%';
SELECT patient_id, age, outcome FROM patient_health_outcomes WHERE age BETWEEN 40 AND 60 ORDER BY outcome DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_health_outcomes WHERE treatment IS NOT NULL AND outcome = 'Improved';
SELECT * FROM patient_demographics;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, gender FROM patient_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_id, location FROM patient_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM health_records WHERE outcome = 'Recovered';
SELECT count(*) AS total_records FROM health_records;
SELECT * FROM patient_demographics WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT patient_name, age, location FROM patient_demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment FROM patient_demographics JOIN health_records ON patient_demographics.patient_id = health_records.patient_id WHERE diagnosis='COVID-19';
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients, MAX(age) AS max_age FROM patient_demographics;
SELECT patient_name, outcome FROM patient_demographics JOIN health_records ON patient_demographics.patient_id = health_records.patient_id WHERE outcome='Recovered' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM PatientDemographics;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM PatientDemographics WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, ethnicity FROM PatientDemographics ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis, condition_severity FROM PatientConditions WHERE condition_severity > 3;
SELECT patient_id, outcome_date, recovery_status FROM PatientOutcomes WHERE follow_up_required = true;
SELECT * FROM PatientDemographics;
SELECT patient_id, age, gender FROM PatientDemographics WHERE age > 30;

SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, recovery_status FROM PatientDemographics pd JOIN PatientConditions pc ON pd.patient_id = pc.patient_id JOIN PatientOutcomes po ON pd.patient_id = po.patient_id WHERE pc.condition_severity > 3 AND po.recovery_status = 'Good';

SELECT patient_name, treatment, treatment_duration FROM PatientDemographics pd JOIN PatientConditions pc ON pd.patient_id = pc.patient_id WHERE treatment_duration > 7 ORDER BY treatment_duration DESC;
SELECT patient_id, outcome_date, f...ollow_up_required = TRUE AND follow_up_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT treatment_name, cost FROM Treatments WHERE cost > 100.00 ORDER BY treatment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM LabTests WHERE test_result LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT outcome_name, outcome_value, outcome_date FROM HealthOutcomes WHERE outcome_value < 50.00 ORDER BY outcome_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%' ORDER BY patient_id DESC;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Treatments.treatment_name, Treatments.cost FROM Patients INNER JOIN Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Treatments.patient_id WHERE Treatments.cost > 500 ORDER BY Patients.patient_name;
SELECT patient_name, test_name, test_result FROM Patients LEFT JOIN LabTests ON Patients.patient_id = LabTests.patient_id WHERE test_result IS NOT NULL ORDER BY test_date DESC;

SELECT patient_name, outcome_name, outcome_value FROM Patients LEFT JOIN HealthOutcomes ON Patients.patient_id = HealthOutcomes.patient_id WHERE outcome_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY outcome_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_id, patient_age FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT average(result_value) AS avg_result FROM LabResults;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_plan FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;

SELECT patient_name, patient_age, record_date FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id WHERE MedicalRecords.diagnosis LIKE '%diabetes%' ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(patient_id), patient_gender FROM Patients GROUP BY patient_gender HAVING COUNT(patient_id) > 2;

SELECT patient_name, treatment_plan FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id JOIN Medications ON Patients.patient_id = Medications.patient_id WHERE Medications.end_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
